SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rowCount, ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT A.CTSNN_ID AS ctsnnId , A.USER_ID AS usid , A.CTSNN_CODE AS ctsnnCd , A.REQST_DE AS reqstDe , A.CTSNN_NM AS ctsnnNm , A.TRGTER_NM AS trgterNm , A.BRTHDY AS brth , A.OCCRRNC_DE AS occrrDe , A.RELATE AS relate , A.RM AS remark , A.SANCTNER_ID AS sanctnerId , A.CONFM_AT AS confmAt , A.SANCTN_DT AS sanctnDt , A.RETURN_RESN AS returnResn , A.INFRML_SANCTN_ID AS infrmlSanctnId , C.USER_NM AS usNm , (select mst.USER_NM from COMVNUSERMASTER mst where mst.ESNTL_ID = SANCTNER_ID) AS sanctnerNm , (select code_nm from COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE where code_id ='COM054' and code = A.CTSNN_CODE) AS ctsnnCdNm , (select info.ORGNZT_NM from COMTNORGNZTINFO info where info.ORGNZT_ID = C.ORGNZT_ID ) AS orgnztNm FROM COMTNCTSNNMANAGE A, COMVNUSERMASTER C WHERE 1=1 AND A.USER_ID = C.ESNTL_ID
A.CTSNN_CODE = #searchKeyword#
A.OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #searchFromDate# AND #searchToDate#
C.USER_NM like '%'||#searchNm#||'%'
A.CONFM_AT like '%'||#searchConfmAt#||'%'
ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC ) ALL_LIST ) WHERE rowCount > #firstIndex# AND rowCount <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
